message.content:
I'll identify the three specific line items from the cash flow statement:

1. First, I'm looking for "the addition in the amount owed by the entity for goods or services received or purchased on credit" - this corresponds to "Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable" which has a value of 247000.00

2. Next, I need "acquisition of property, plant and equipment" - this corresponds to "Purchase of Fixed Assets" which has a value of 85889.19

3. Finally, I need "cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period" - this corresponds to "Beginning Balance" which has a value of 8000000.00
